website_summaries.verdict: Deluxe set with UV and LED lamp, 6 starter colors, and all the manicure tools you need.
pros: 48 watt high-power lamp capable of curing all gel polish types
Polish formula is toxin-free, low odor, and free of harsh additives that strip and damage nails
Comes with high-quality top gel and base gel
cons: Chip-free polish only lasts around 5 days
Color accuracy isn’t always there, so expect some changes as polish dries

customer_reviews.title: Salon quality gel manicures at home!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended beetles gel to me and I saw they launched a starter kit. I always get gels done but it gets to be expensive so I wanted to try doing them myself. I love this kit! It’s perfect for any beginner for diy gels at home. The lamp is amazing, you get 6 colors, great files, and everything else you need for the perfect mani. No more salon appointments for me! Thanks Beetles Gel!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Sbarra

customer_reviews.title: Works super well! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to use! As easy to use as normal nail polish, at least. My nails turned out really well, though I used a color from a different set of Beetles polish. I will update after I have worn it for awhile and see how long it lasts, but the initial look is as good as I have gotten in salons!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia M

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: First time doing my own gel manicure. I did french tips and even doing that, it was easy. I gave longevity a one star but to be fair, I've only had it on a week and haven't tried any of the other colors except the pink and white. After a week, my nails still look good with no chipping at all. The base coat is still sticky after curing and I wasn't aware that it would be like that but I'm sure that was because I didn't know better. I cured the pink and white for 60 seconds each and the top coat for the same amount of time. The top coat is super shiny and turned out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: daughter

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this thinking it was going to be a great deal but it wasn't. My nails would take roughly 20 minutes to dry. I did not receive the kit nor the base and top coat (had to purchase at Sallys) and I also had to use my daughters nail filer and buffer. The nail polish colors were to light so I had to apply at least 3 coats which caused them to chip so I eventually peeled all of them off. I will be returning the lamp and gel colors but I will purchase their gel colors from another box to test them out.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Romero

customer_reviews.title: Broken and scratched!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got my box, opened it up and plugged in the lamp, worked fine but noticed the bitten was severely scratched. Went to do my nails, put on base coat put hand under lamp worked for 60 sec, and nothing!!!!! I’m so frustrated. I now have one hand with tacky clear g and a lamp that came broken. Everything else was great. But does me NO good with out a working lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Uv/led set
customer_reviews.text: The gels are great quality like it said in the bio. The light works well however I got a lump in my inner finger after I used it once on my nails. Iknow uv light can be damaging to skin an cause cancer if over exposed so not sure if that is what happening. But alot of items for the price and good quality you can't go wrong with that. Use sun screen on hands for any exposed to uv/ led lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Samari Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Great for a starter
customer_reviews.text: I have been my nails done since high school and with the COVID-19 I had to do something. Everything was sold out or was out of stock/no delivery until months out. I was lucky to find this and honestly for beginner I think it’s perfect. The lamp works perfect I’ve used it twice so far no issues. Cute colors of polish ...not much bad to say I mean you get what you pay for in a good way. It’s still hard for me to do my own nails but still great price instead of salon.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Giancola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home Gel mani
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great instructions. Colors are as described. When removing old gel, would recommend filing it down and then place cotton balls with acetone. Also the base coat slightly runs to the side and I think this is normal or maybe I’m just putting too much. However, clean it off prior to curing under light. Also be careful when removing gel with stick... must be used at an angle to avoid nicking the nail. Overall, loved this product. Already have done 2 sets and saved money
customer_reviews.author: Aracely Puerto

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My investment in this product and extra colors was paid off in about two visits for professional gel fills. I've only done a full set of nails twice, and I'm still learning, but they look almost as good as going to a salon. While others have had problems with longevity, I haven't. Both times I've done a full set, at about day 10 I've needed to redo one or two nails. Then I get about another week to 10 days before I do the full set again. My only wish is that you could buy colors in singles. The 6-packs always have colors I'd never wear.
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: A great value and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is a super user friendly gel mani kit with quality polishes. I was able to give myself a very good home manicure. My nails look a million times better now and the LED light is well made and sturdy. The gel polishes give great coverage. I did three coats but could have totally gone with 2, no problem. Be careful with the cuticle trimmer—I cut myself twice. My only feedback is that the colors look different from the photos, and yes, I checked these on three different monitors. The pink is pepto pink and the red is a little browner than it reads online.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this three times now. On my feet and hands, I just have to say... I LOVE IT! I only would’ve been able to go to the salon twice for what I paid for this thing! And the polish is good quality. I recommend this for everyone! If you’re wondering if you should try gel polish. Do yourself a favor and buy this set. It has everything you need and you won’t be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, peels and comes off in days.
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything shown. Tools for cleaning up nails are very good. Color choice is nice. Uv light is as shown. Gets a little hot. NOT long lasting gel. Can be peeled right off. Base coat dries splotchy when applied. Cures with double the recommended time. Colors are as shown. Two coat minimum for the color to actually be as shown. Will not be buying anymore from this company since actualgel is very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: SCNGrimace

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to start doing my own nails without the expense of the nail shop, This product helps me and comes with different nail polish colors, I didn't like some of them and only really wanted the black polish but overall this product is good to do your nails and my daughters nails especially when we are in a rush to go on a trip and don't have to wait at the nail shop for 2 hours, quick and easy do it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: LaSu'e

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this deal, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Came with a lot of pieces and everything seems to be high quality. I think the light could be stronger because I have to cure 2-3 times but otherwise I'm happy with the price and everything that came with it. I purchased some other colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Thai Munroe

customer_reviews.title: Never going to salon again!
customer_reviews.text: Received this set yesterday. Since the COVID hit I had to remove my acrylic nails and regular nail polish was aggravating with all the chipping & breaking. I did some research and purchased the Beetles set. I’ve showered, bathed the dog, and washed my hands dozens of times - Still no chip! I have no plans to go back to a salon when we can, this set is perfect and it comes with 6 colors! (I recommend using thin layers for longer lasting manicure). Very easy. The Beetles set has so many add ons available too like design foils, rhinestones, and soooo many colors.... great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'am very happy with this product. The secret is to apply the base coat very light, if you put too much of the base coat it will smear everywhere, another mistake that I did was to paint both hands and put them on the UV light one at the time, the trick is to paint one hand first and put it on the UV light and than the other hand.. After I used this product a couple of time gets easier and easier.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela

customer_reviews.title: This is not a great product like the description.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this light about three times since getting it and the power strip is detaching already. I have to dry my nails multiple times on the highest setting. The nail polish colors are to light so I had to apply at least 4 coats which caused them to chip so I eventually peeled all of them off.
customer_reviews.author: Dayana Bjorkman

customer_reviews.title: Replacement received
customer_reviews.text: So i ordered this nail kit and it came without a cord for the lamp so that was pretty upsetting because I didn’t even get to use it. But I filed a return for missing pieces with amazon and then sent me a whole new kit! This kit is seriously awesome! The lamp works so good. The gel polish is such great quality and the tools are soo helpful! Best purchase ever! It costs the same as one trip to the salon and you get unlimited usage out of it. Plus it’s really fun. Never going to the salon again! If you are on the fence, buy it! Lasts me about 2 weeks. No peeling or chips.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie A.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous light
customer_reviews.text: The light, the nail kit, and the foundation and top coat are awesome products the nail polish not so much it chips right away and I mean right away I’ve tried Applying the nail polishes differently to see if that would make a difference sadly it did not I definitely would purchase the kit again only because the light and the other products you get are well worth the cost .
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Jo

customer_reviews.title: great buy, was hesitant at first but glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: So I was really really skeptical about this, but I did a lot of research. since we are in quarantine for covid-19 I had to get my nails done some how so I just took the risk and purchased this! It seemed to be the best price with the best colors so I went for it and I’m so glad I did. This does take patience tho, I’m not a professional and do not do my nails often so it took patience and some time but it’s so worth it and it pays off getting your nails done at the salon !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as nail salon
customer_reviews.text: Got this kit during quarantine since I couldn’t go to the nail salon. I like that this kit came with multiple colors and everything you need to give yourself a gel manicure. I followed the instructions it can with. Definitely prep your nails well and cure under the UV light for LONGER than the instructions state. The polish lasted two weeks without any chipping. Only reason why it didn’t last longer than two weeks was because I was ready to try another color and took it off.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not Salon quality
customer_reviews.text: Meh... it’s ok. Polishes are extremely inconsistent. Some work ok, some bubble and peel right away. Some polishes seem to separate and not cover nail very well. Not easy to get off either. It will work while salons are closed at this time.. but not long term. Also only last 5-7 days tops. I usually have chips within a day or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B Casebolt

customer_reviews.title: Tomato red :/
customer_reviews.text: The red shown in the picture is NOT the red that came in the kit. Mine is more of a tomato color. Not happy about that. (I am holding WHITE fabric in the pic) Overall the kit appears to be of good quality. There are quite a few tools included. Instructions were clear and easy to follow. Finished manicure feels durable so far. Caution- the lamp gets quite toasty.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie F

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit!! So far I’ve only used the white and black polish and both of those are super nice! They only need 2 coats. This kit is very easy to use! Be careful with the cuticle cutters because I made myself bleed twice. I wont be touching them again lol. The nail file in the kit works great! Would recommend. I went and bought more gel polish colors to use with this light too.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I suck at painting nails and can never wait for them to dry so spend way too much money getting them done (when the salons are open). One of my favorite you tubers ordered this so I thought I’d try it. Super impressed! I dry for 90 seconds on each coat and no trouble. I will be getting more colors for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant? Wellllll, don’t be!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hesitant? Wellll, don’t be! I was hesitant on purchasing this and had it in my cart for a while. Well, I plunged and purchased it and absolutely love it. This seems like it’ll go a long ways (longevity is a plus), my nails look like they would after going to a salon, and I can’t express how I feel. Literally having my nails done anytime and them not being ugly. Lol. Just purchase it!!
customer_reviews.author: vbabez

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent and was an excellent gift! Some reviews stated it was "scratched" or looked "used". My order had a small scratch that looked like it was from packaging, however for the value this means nothing. Works better than expected and my girl has not been to a nail salon since!
customer_reviews.author: Goderek

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I researched several different brands and decided on this one which worked perfectly! Very easy to understand and user friendly. I decided to do the color and top coat for 120 seconds 2x to be safe and haven’t had any issues... The picture included is after applying the process a week earlier and my toes still look great with no chipping or color change... Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kamekona Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Stunned that they made it through my car repair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I provided a portion of the video in which I am working in areas that would normally tear my nails/polish apart... I was working in there for 30 minutes and they still look freshly done!!! Also note I did this manicure a week ago ... Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Love from Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Bargin and really good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is brilliant so easy to use for feet and fingers. Very light weigh and easy to use. Really great value. This is the first time I have done my nails and it's as easy as painting your nails wirh normal nail varnish. You only need to wait 60 seconds for it to set. And it's very portable. I love the nail kit that comes with it you get everything that you need. It's going to save me lots of money and time. The top coat and base coat are just the right thickness and I love the brush as it easy to apply thankyou
customer_reviews.author: Ru-tee

customer_reviews.title: Pictures can be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving my product, I was excited to finally get my nails done at home. I was slightly disappointed after I had reviewed my new products. The advertisement showing the display of products is a little disappointing. I was under the impression that I was going to receive a nail art dust brush that appears in the picture much like what nail salons use. However, I received what appeared to be what some would consider a make-up brush much like a blush brush but even smaller in width. I have not had the time to play around with my products as of yet, but overall I am pleased with the rest of the set.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Stowe

customer_reviews.title: Good start up set
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine for around a month. It does a great job curing the polish however the cord you plug from the machine to the wall is faulty and you have to jiggle and adjust it for it to actually work. (hence the rating) however it can easily be replaced. The polish seems to last a decent amount of time. Not the best quality but you definitely get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.author: dyonnalewis

customer_reviews.title: Great UV Lamp, Terrible Polish
customer_reviews.text: The UV lamp is of wonderful value for the price, however, the accompanying nail polish that it comes with is horrible (at best). You have to put on multiple coats which makes the polish very thick and it comes off (in chunks) in the next 12 hours. I would NEVER purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LiAnn Seale

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Did my mother in laws 87 years old nails by giving her a mani they look Fabulous!!!!! Easy to use Great Product
customer_reviews.author: CathyLiCious

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with everything you need to start doing your own gel nails. It also comes with super easy to follow instructions. It takes a couple times to find your groove and really get good results, but even after the first use, you’ll be in love.
customer_reviews.author: Timi Kiewel

customer_reviews.title: Great products, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Even though it may take longer than regular polish, they are so much more durable! I love the light, and the gel. I recommend you buy a nail dihydrater, and nail primer seperate to make the polish work to its full potential.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quarantine!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth it ! Yes, this was a little pricey but it’s so perfect! During quarantine I haven’t been able to get my nails done so this definitely helped me a lot! It’s super easy to use. I now do all my friends nails. It’s also good to have for a last minute manicure if you are desperate and can’t make it to An appointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amany S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this kit!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very apprehensive about purchasing this, man was I wrong!!! This kit is amazing!!!! My nails stayed pristine for 3 weeks, I only took it off so I could try another color!!!! The only downside is this kit does not contain the remover. LOVE this kit!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JAMIEMING

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this at home set alot. I thought it was a good value for the money but unfortunately I have seen it fluctuate in price and I bought it at a high point. Other than that its simple to use and great for practice and saving a bit of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amaris DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it !
customer_reviews.text: This is actually one of the best nail kits I’ve ever used! Was skeptical at first but it’s amazing! Super easy to use and the sizes of the polish is good and nail dryer is perfect! Would buy again as gifts and looking into getting more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa H

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: absolutely loved this, it was so easy to use, and the light works great, the pink color is a little runny, so apply a think coat first, cure it and then apply a second coat, you get a beautiful result, highly recommended, read all the directions before starting, will be ordering more colors, no more nail salon for me.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I wanna thank God and Beetles
customer_reviews.text: I love it. So easy to use, I’ve had it for a while now like over 6 months, still have all the original set and haven’t run out of anything! I am so grateful to have found this kit! Also, the gels? lowest odor I’ve ever experienced in a polish!
customer_reviews.author: Hercilia Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect At - Home Nails
customer_reviews.text: I only write a review when a product really, "hits me." This nail lamp and nail polish set is awesome. I am a beginner at doing gel nails at home. The nails dried perfectly, they did not chip or peel, and they made my way nails very strong. My nails are damaged from years of acrylics, and now I am working with my real nails. However, I could not function because my nails were paper thin after I removed the acrylic. With this gel nail set, they feel strong and are beautiful, and they look like I came from the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! I love love love this gel nail set. I did a lot of research and read a ton of reviews. before purchasing. It’s such nice quality!! The polish isn’t thick and the brush is really nice which makes easy application. So happy. I plan on buying all the colors so I can have a compete setup at home.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner at doing my own nails since going to the salon did get expensive. This kit comes with everything you need to get started. It’ll take a few tries to get the hang of it but it really is a cool kit to own. Have been doing my own nails for a months and I enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lesly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set! The polish stays on so well, even at almost 3 weeks! And that’s with cleaning the entire house once a week and tons of dishes daily! So worth the money for a busy mom of 2 who doesn’t always have the time to get to the nail salon!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Eck

customer_reviews.title: It's more then what I expected
customer_reviews.text: You must try this sale! but wooooowww the base and top coat are larger then what I expected.. the colors are so pretty.. I'm a licensed nail technician I can say they ate worth it..
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Soria

customer_reviews.title: not what i hoped for
customer_reviews.text: the process was pretty standard, kit came with a lot of items. However the red polish was my main concern and it really didnt live up up to what i hoped. it was quite sheer, the bottle wasnt tightly sealed upon arrival so it leaked abit. Ive used gel polishes for many years so Im very well aware of the process but this kit didnt really fit the bill for me. 4 days and already chipping despite being quite careful in application and steps
customer_reviews.author: Charles Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I received my kit a couple days ago. I really liked how easy it was to set up and use. Everything that was supposed to come with the kit was inside which was a relieve especially during this crisis. It came with instructions on how to use the UV light and a tip manual on how to help keep your nails from chipping. It also has questions from previous shoppers and answers. I will keep an update on how long the gel last and more reviews as I keep practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Y Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Set was very complete and actually worth more than what was charged. I priced a set like this in my home store and it was almost triple this set's price. Polish is beautiful and lamp is easy to set up. It also cam with a full manicure kit. All the items in the kit were the real deal not just disposable orange sticks and cheap nail files. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie L. Files

customer_reviews.title: NOO
customer_reviews.text: I’m really not happy. I followed ALL the directions did my nails and they looked beautiful! An hour later, looked down and one nail was gone and the rest simple PEELED RIGHT OFF. not happy
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit and value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the money and easy to use. However the big kabuki brush was a tiny cheap brush but you don’t really use it so I’ll let it slide. I shopped a lot of starter kits and this was a good start. There are better brands of polish out there but good start!
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn holland-wright

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product.
customer_reviews.text: This product ruined my nails. They are thinned and rotten. One thumb and one toe ended up with burns and blisters. My nails are separated from the nail bed. when putting my nails under the lamp, it felt like I was sticking them in a fire. This product is dangerous. If able I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great value - polish isn't good
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use and it's nice it came with everything you need, but the polish doesn't last at all. Maybe 2 days max for me. Then ends up ruining my nails from having to peel if off unless I spend an hour soaking it off. Probably will buy a diff brand polish. Light is good though.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Wish I got this earlier
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Was skeptical at first bc of some reviews. But if you do thin layers and cure for 60-120 sec, it will turn out amazing!! Been paying 35$ for the salon and these honestly come out nicer than the salon! Took it to our weekly girls paint&wine night and now the other girls are buying the same set haha. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Puck

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking gel is usually really resilient and strong. Boy was I wrong! this polish started chipping the very next day. And, NO I didn't have my hands in water a lot between when I put it on and when they started chipping... I have a dishwasher so my hands are not in water for a prolonged amount of time. Was highly disappointed in this product and returned it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: vickie qualey

customer_reviews.title: Good Value For Price
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as described, the lamp was my main reason for purchasing and it works great, cures the polishes completely and I like the fact that it has different setting buttons on it. I searched all the polishes and they cured fine on 90 or 120 sec. I LOVE the topcoat it came with. I make and sell press ons so I can’t vouch for the base coat but the topcoat was amazing. I also like the fact that it came with cuticle oil. All in all you really can’t beat it for the price your paying.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Better longevity
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my wife and she loves it. Took a little time for her to get used to using it but shes only doing her nails once a week, not every single day now.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: The nail polish gel are very transparent
customer_reviews.text: The design and size of the lamp is perfect. But the nail polish gel are not of very good quality, they are very transparent and you have to put the color more than three times so that it can be seen well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Muñoz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am super pleased with this purchase. So far i have used the red and pink and they both look great on. I will say that the pink requires 3 coats but other than that, this kit is perfect and leaves you with a professional and gorgeous looking gel manicure. One thing to note is that your nails will be slightly tacky between layers and after the top coat. Just use a cotton ball and rubbing alcohol to seal the nail when you're done applying and curing the top coat and it will be shiny and sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa G-V

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, but needs cuticle nippers!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for beginners. The light works great and it’s nice it comes with the majority of the tools. I would strongly suggest getting cuticle nippers in addition to this kit as the cuticle fork is very cheap and does a poor job. The polishes can be a little finicky but apply smoothly when warmed up in hot water! Would recommend this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Colors don’t last
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great except for the colors they peal right off my nails in a day had to buy different brand colors but everything else works good
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Kester

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent option to keep the gel system at home
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent option to keep the gel system at home, I do not recommend that you use it with another brand of nail paint, use the brand that the machine brings
customer_reviews.author: Harnu

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This was nice for a temporary fix. It stripped my nails and it also burns when you put your hand in.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ozaluk

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! Great for beginners. And easy to use with acrylic or stand alone polish, you HAVE to file your nails down for it to stay, and do thin coats to where they don’t go on uneven! Other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Bunnell

customer_reviews.title: Save money on salons!
customer_reviews.text: No more salons for us! This is perfect! Bought one for emerald my daughter! She does her hands, feet and works on her daughter hands and feet too. I love this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Torres Ziemba

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Bundle
customer_reviews.text: Beetles is a great, high quality brand with great prices. All items included were packaged well, no damage, everything exactly as described. All items accounted for.
customer_reviews.author: Sunni Marie

customer_reviews.title: Best quarentine purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I get my nails done every two weeks, so being home for over a month had my nails looking a little scary! I ordered this just to try it out and see if I could make my nails look a little better. THIS PRODUCT IS AMAZING! The step by step instructions made it fool proof, and now my nails look like I made it to the nail salon. I will be ordering more colors soon, and will continue to do my own nails from the comfort of my own home!
customer_reviews.author: nicole lallo

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kit and another with just polish, same brand. I’m in love! Just make sure to follow instructions and prep nails good before you apply. Saving a ton of money since myself and 15 yr old daughter love gel polish..
customer_reviews.author: kristie

customer_reviews.title: Works great! 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smaller $30 bundle to try it out. It’s my first time using this product, usually go to the salon for dip but due to Covid... that’s not been an option for me. The item works great, as long as you follow the instructions, take your time, apply thin coats. I enjoyed using the item and I think my nails look great... I just hope they don’t chip easily. Totally worth the $30 for this set! I will now buy more colors 😊
customer_reviews.author: A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Tanned hands
customer_reviews.text: It's great for natural long nails. It gives the nail a thick layer that prevents it from chipping or breaking. UV light dies tan the hands within a couple of uses. But still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Solen'ya

customer_reviews.title: Sticky layer is normal
customer_reviews.text: The base coat will be sticky!!! This is normal. You can paint the color over it or use lint free wipes & alcohol to remove it. Great product to start at home gel nails. There gold is a fine glitter & the silver is a bigger glitter. The black & white are great to lawyer under the glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it, she's a beginner when it came to the gel polish side of things. But she had no problem doing it herself.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the cost $$
customer_reviews.text: Great results and super easy to use. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect I use everything in this kit and the colors look amazing. Great quality and for the price im very empressed.
customer_reviews.author: billycat

customer_reviews.title: Value for you $$
customer_reviews.text: So far pretty happy & excited about this purchase! This was mine & my daughter's frst time doing our own nails, since all the salons are closed due to COVID 19. This kit is perfect for beginners, beacuse it has the essentials needed to get started. The price for all the items you get, also can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!! Love this entire kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit and easy to use!!! I use the tools in this kit for regular polish and dipping powder as well!! The value is great too!! The polishes have beautiful colors and the top coat is super shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Hallie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I washed my hands and used hand sanitizer a lot today. They did not chip. I’m not very good at polishing my nails, but this kit made it a little easier. Definitely salon quality UV light and gel polish. Everything arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, nail polishes not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this product kit except for the nail polishes. When using the nail polish that comes with this kit, the polish does not last at all. Mine will either peel same day or next day. I have ordered other gel polish brands in addition to this and i have no problem with the polish peeling. So i would keep that in mind. Everything else with the kit works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: good while it lasted! Several of my nails I had to redo because the polish kept coming off shortly after putting it on. It will take me a bit to perfect it, but I love this! I was able to do it easily. I am not sure how long it will last, but I love not having to wait long for my nails to dry
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Don’t usually review but this is an AWESOME deal. My first time ever using gel polish. The UV dome is big enough for your whole hand, the polish cures wonderfully and it’s not chipped so far today after doing lots of chores with my hands. Love.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Mathewson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy — Planned Obsolescence
customer_reviews.text: Only used the nail light one time and it no longer functions. The lights do not turn on and it can conveniently no longer be returned. Don’t waste your money, this is a perfect example of planned obsolescence. Additionally — the nail polish peeled right off after 2 days of wear.
customer_reviews.author: GML

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, works as expected, beginner friendly
customer_reviews.text: This if the first time ever i do my nails my self. It was pretty easy and i think they were drying really fast. I only used the pink and i can tell that its pretty thin. I added 3 layers and i still think it will look better with more layers. I will try the other colors and let you know. Nevertheless its a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: belal

customer_reviews.title: Great at home solution
customer_reviews.text: Just tried my gel kit for the first time. Super easy. I’ve been missing mani/pedis since the Stay At Home orders went through. This is a great solution. I’m not the best at doing my own nails but instant drying is so nice. My only complaint is the pale pink is very sheer. I needed 3 layers to get solid coverage.
customer_reviews.author: David Seigler

customer_reviews.title: Great items
customer_reviews.text: I love this! This works great I do my own nails and my teenage daughter and she likes me to do her nails every two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Evealcocer5

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Geez! Thanks beetles! I’m now addicted to collecting your product!! Lol! Love this product and all of the sets so far. I’m a beginner but this product is so great I don’t think I’ll be going back to the nail salon!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great buuuuttttt....
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Beautiful colors. But sadly after my 3rd time using it my lamp comes in but Uv light doesn’t. Really disappointed because I have so many beautiful colors with no lamp. Would have been 5 stars if my lamp still worked.
customer_reviews.author: Mallorie

customer_reviews.title: Easy, looks salon done!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, looks salon done! Friends compliment me on my nails. After having acrylics I needed something more than just polish and this is perfect. With the cost of one visit to the salon for gels I can do them myself again and again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so much stuff for such a reasonable price~
customer_reviews.text: I really love this!! It works great and comes with so many little things! I can look like I just came from the salon without having to spend a fortune
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D. Livne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been doing my own gel mani’s and pedi’s for years now. This kit seriously changed everything. The base and top coat are amazing and the light cures so fast! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: I never did my own gel nails, only regular polish. For the first time it was actually pretty good! Is very easy to use, for me the polish really cured well under the UV light, colors are nice. I am now looking to get more colors! Well done !!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Bensuaski Quilici

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use! Powerful lamp! Dries my polygel in 30-60 seconds. The colors included are also very pretty. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Julia R.

customer_reviews.title: Still really like it!
customer_reviews.text: Update!! I've used it a couple of times and it's okay. For some reason no matter how long i cure the polish I get bubbles and bumps. I feel that the problem is mainly the base gel not the actual colors. I will try the colors with a better base gel.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit. Everything that comes with it is great for a beginner nail tech. The gel polish however, is a little bit in the thick side and not great coverage. Takes 2 coats and then it may be a little bumpy. But overall this is great.
customer_reviews.author: QueenC

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this!!! If you are looking to get a set this is where to start! It comes with all the polish you’d need! Base, top (mat and regular), and several different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on for long
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. When I do my nails they never stay on long. Maybe 4 days, I don't really reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaelynn

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to start with.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit to start with comes with everything you need even cuticle oil. Recommend to cure for 90 seconds seems to cure nicely. Also purchased other beetle polish colors. Very nice product to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Pellot

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality - No Chipping! :)
customer_reviews.text: I am so very impressed with the quality of this product. I was a bit wary as it was a lot cheaper than any other brands, but wow! I am not a professional nail technician - I love having my nails done, but found it to be so expensive and it lasted a week and just always chipped. With this product, my nails last 3 weeks, I use Clorox and still, no chipping! Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Naquita

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gel kit!
customer_reviews.text: I was more than satisfied with this gel kit! It is perfect for beginners like me and even more skilled nail artists, it had all of the items that were shown in the pictures and was packaged nicely. They included 2 manuals, one for the polish and the UV light. I absolutely love it, I will be ordering more from this company Beetles!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Burnette

customer_reviews.title: No more nail appts!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price!! I just did my first manicure about 4 days ago and it still looks great. I would say you have to cure the nail polish for longer than 60 seconds for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Imani Hodge

product_meta.title: Beetles UV Gel Nail Polish Kit with UV/LED Light 48W Nail Lamp, White Glitter Gel Nail Polish Set Red Pink Nail Gel Polish Kit Base Top Coat Gel Manicure Nail Kit with U V Light Starter Kit DIY Home
product_meta.description:
Package Content

1. Gel Nail Polish 7.5ml X6
2. 48W LED UV Nail Lamp X1
3. No Wipe Top Coat and Base Coat 15ml X1 
4. Cuticle Oil X 1 
5. 48W LED Nail Lamp X 1 
6. Nail File X 1 
7. Nail Buffer x 1 
8. Nail Brush for Hands X 1 
9. Nail Brush for Toes X 1 
10. Cuticle Fork X 1 
11. Cuticle Pusher X 1 
12. Nail Clipper X 1 
13. Nail Separator X 2 

Application Process: 

1. Preparation: Trim, file and buff nails for a clean surface.
✰ Before opening the bottle, roll the bottle between your hands back and forth to gently mix.
2. Base Coat: Apply thin base coat, dry under UV/LED lamp for 60 seconds.
3. Gel polish: Apply first thin layer of color gel polish and dry under UV/LED lamp for 60 seconds. Apply the second or third layer color gel polish. 
✰ When applying color, wipe excess gel with brush before applying strokes. 
4. Top Coat: Finish off with a layer of top coat, dry under UV/LED lamp for 60 seconds. 
✰ Seal the edges of your nails with the brush horizontally to avoid chipping

*Tips to avoid chipping: 

1. Before applying, please ensure your nails are completely dry, clean and oil-free. 
2. Don't apply gel on the hand or cuticle. 
3. Apply gel to the edge of each nail to seal the gel and avoid chipping. 

Removal Process:

1. Lightly buff off the shine from the top of nails using a nail buffer. 
2. Soak a cotton ball or pad with nail gel remover and place on top of each nail. 
3. Wrap the nail with aluminum foil or any nail wrap to secure and allow the remover to soak. 
4. Soak for a minimum of 10 minutes. 
5. Remove cotton and foils one at a time and gently push off gel using a removal wand. Gel should come off easily without much effort. If necessary, re-saturate cotton and rewrap finger and soak for 5 more minutes.
6. Lightly buff nails again once all gel is removed.
feature_bullets: As Gel Nail Polish Kit with u v light led nail dryer with beetles gel nail polish set, you can enjoy doing your nails at home with this gel nail polish set to complete ALL-IN-ONE Kit! Everything you need to start doing your nails yourself! This lamp has no bottom, making it lighter to carry and use. If you are still accustomed to the bottom of the lamp belt, it is recommended to place a paper towel commonly used at home on the bottom of the lamp for easy cleaning and packing.

HIGH POWER LAMP: Soak off LED UV Glitter Gel Nail Polish Kit With UV LED Light Nail Lamp - 6 colors classic white black pink red glitter gel nail polish set with 48W high power nail dryer to cure fastly all kinds of led gel nail polish, base gel top coat and poly gel nail extension kit. 30 LEDs cuts curing time in half!

What You Get: Full size of 6 colors red pink white gel nail polish set, durable 48W LED nail lamp dryer, 9 pieces of nail art designs manicure tools and 3 bottles of base gel shine matte top coat which is high quality gel nail manicure kit with u v light for a cost-effective price, guaranteed!

Easy Application and Good Tenacity: 6 gorgeous colors of 9 Toxin Free formula Gel Polish with low odor - No harsh ingredients or adhesives that lead to damaged nails. The series of black glitter white uv nail polish set is long lasting for 21+ days with perfect shine under proper application - With base gel matte glossy top coat under the full application Process.

WARNING: May product an allergic reaction by skin contact. Read directions for use carefully. For professional use only. Only used for nail. Avoid contact with eyes, mouth and skin. Rinse them immediately should the product comes into contact with them. If there is any incident, contact the doctor immediately. Stop using the product if redness and itching develop. If symptom persists, consult a doctor. Keep out of the reach of children.
